channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jobless claims jump to two-month high, but holidays may be to blame
Elon Musk’s wealth at $400 billion means now he can say he’s Rockefeller rich
Shark Tank judge Daymond John reveals a 3 step approach for building wealth that anyone can follow
item.description: Lucky breaks or keen investments are nothing without strategy and long-term vision.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery shares surge 15% after company announces linear, streaming restructuring
item.description: Warner Bros. announced a restructuring plan to segment its business into linear and streaming units in a move that could simplify future consolidation...

item.title: ECB lowers interest rates by 25 basis points to 3.0% as expected
MicroStrategy shares could surge even higher if added to Nasdaq 100 on Friday
Exclusive: This 31-year-old Google alum raised $75 million for a frontier tech fund backed by Marc Andreessen and a cofounder of OpenAI
item.description: Casey Caruso thinks that investors who deeply understand technology will win.

item.title: CNBC is reportedly planning a streaming service
item.description: Stand-alone service is set to launch in the first quarter of 2025.

item.title: How I sent Buzz Lightyear to space—and what it taught me about innovation
item.description: Getting a Pixar toy up to the International Space Station took bravery and creativity, says Disney alum Duncan Wardle.

item.title: More stocks that are adopting MicroStrategy's bitcoin yield strategy
item.description: More and more bitcoin miners are starting to undertake a strategy harnessed by MicroStrategy, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: Your next Marriott hotel room might be a cabin in the woods
item.description: The world’s largest hotel company is adding tiny cabins and nature retreats, on the heels of similar moves by Hyatt and Hilton.

item.title: Trump says the U.S. is going to do 'something great with crypto'
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump spoke with CNBC's Jim Cramer at the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday.

item.title: Wholesale inflation report likely gives go-ahead for Fed to cut interest rates
Trump rings bell at NYSE to cheers of 'USA' as Wall Street CEOs, business leaders look on
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump, who seeks to attract and boost business in the U.S., was greeted with enthusiasm from the NYSE crowd.

item.title: FAA head Michael Whitaker to step down before Trump takes office
